style_anime_desc: Create a cartoon-style portrait: Keep the same outfit and pose as in the original image. Use a clean white background. The style should be semi-realistic or stylized cartoon, but the facial features and clothing must closely resemble the original photo.
style_watercolor_desc: Paint a new portrait in a watercolor cartoon style, keeping the facial and outfits structure similar to the original. Use soft, gentle colors and a white background.
